an8.16:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing eight qualities, a bhikkhu is worthy of going on a mission. What eight?
an8.16:2: One who does not tremble when he arrivesat an assembly with fierce debaters;who does not omit wordsor conceal his message;
an8.16:3: who speaks without hesitation,and does not waver when asked a question;a bhikkhu like this is worthyof going on a mission.
